channel.title: Adding Items To Client!

item.title: Adding Items To Client!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I’ve added custon items before to my client…But I tried to add void and they’re still nulls…This is what I put in

if(i == 13594){ //Void Knight Gloves
              class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
              class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
              class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
              class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
              class8.anIntArray156[0] = #;
              class8.anIntArray160[0] = #;
              class8.anIntArray156[1] = #;
              class8.anIntArray160[1] = #;       
 class8.anInt174= #;
class8.anInt181= #;
class8.anInt190= #;
class8.anInt198= #;
class8.anInt204= #;
class8.anInt169= #;
class8.anInt194= #;
class8.anInt165= #;
class8.anInt200= #;
class8.anInt188= #;
class8.anInt164= #;
class8.anInt175= #;
class8.anInt197= #;
              class8.aString170 = "Void Knight Gloves";
              class8.aByteArray178 = "It's some Void Knight Gloves".getBytes();
              }
